page.title: 09...RELIGION
page.content: The community is mainly a Christian one and this is reflected in the number and denomination of most of the places of worship in the area.All Saints,Ownall Rd,St Philip and St James on Hodge Hill Common & St.Mary's & St.Margaret's in Castle Bromwich are C.of E. Queen Elizabeth II officially opened All Saints on 3.11.55 and the present vicar is Rev.Caddy. Rev.John Marsh has been vicar of St. Philip and James for 17 years and had a special service to mark his leaving on 16.6.85 at which many children from the area took part. St. Wilfrid's, Shawsdale Rd., is the only R.C. church and Rev. Whelan has been parish priest there since it opened. Archbishop Grimshaw laid a stone there on 8.2.64.On the Coleshill Rd.is Hodge Hill United Reformed Church. Others include a Gospel Hall, Methodist, Pentecostal & Christadelphian Halls.
